Title: Establishes standards for the reuse of deconstructed building materials
Summary: Establishes standards for the reuse of deconstructed building materials; requires the uniform building code to set standards for the use of solid-sawn lumber in construction and for the grading of used solid-sawn lumber; requires the secretary of state to develop a program for grading reclaimed wood for structural purposes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing standards for the reuse of deconstructed building materials
